document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the types of Coleoptera (Insecta) deposited at Museo de Historia Natural de la Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos (MUSM), Lima, Peru

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the types of Coleoptera (Insecta) deposited at Museo de Historia Natural de la Universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos (MUSM), Lima, Peru

paragraph.materialsCitation: Syntype with labels: (1) “ PERU , JUNIN [Department of Junin ] // CARHUAMAYO // (4125M[meters of altitude in

subSubSection.paragraph: relation to sea level].) 10.IX [September].[19]47 // F.BLANCAS” [white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “MHN
// 2535” [white label, handwritten in black ink] [red label without data]. (4) “ altica // blancasi m. // J. Bechyne det.,
1955” [white label, the 1st, 2nd lines and last number of year in 3th line handwritten in blue ink, other information
printed in black]. (5) “ LECTOTYPE // Conococha // blancasi (Bechyne) // by, J.Santisteban, 1996” [red label, the

1st line printed in black ink, other information handwritten in black. All text into a black box]. Remarks: specimen in insect pin. Currently this species is in
Conococha Bechyne.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Syntype with labels: (1) “ PERU , JUNIN [Department of Junin ] // CARHUAMAYO // (4125M[meters of altitude in relation to sea level].)
10.IX
[ September ].[19]47 // F.BLANCAS” [white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “MHN // 2535” [old white label, handwritten in black ink]. (3) “ PARATYPE // Conococha // blancasi (Bechyne) // J. Santisteban , 1996” [yellow label, the 1st line printed in black ink, other information handwritten in black. All text into a black box].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: specimen in insect pin. Currently this species is in
Conococha Bechyne.

Syntype with labels: (1) “ Perú , 3.500m [meters of altitude in relation to sea level] // Acolla prés // Huancayo” [old white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “3[March].1948 // Blancas lgt.” [old white label, handwritten in black ink]. (3) “ Type ” [pink label, printed in black ink]. (4) “TiPE // Calligrapha // huancayensis m. // det.Dr. J.Bechyne 1950 ” [old white label, the 1st, 2nd and 3th lines handwritten in black ink, other information printed in black]. (5) “MHN // 2680” [old white label, handwritten in black ink].

Syntype with labels: (1) “ Perú , 3.500 m [meters of altitude in relation to sea level] // Acolla près // Huancayo” [old white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “3[March].1948 // Blancas lgt.” [old white label, handwritten in black ink]. (3) “ Type ” [pink label, printed in black ink]. (4) “TiPE // C. huancayensis // ab.limbolata m. // det.Dr. J.Bechyne 1950 ” [old white label, the 1st, 2nd and 3th lines handwritten in black ink, other information printed in black]. (5) “MHN // 2681” [old white label, handwritten in black ink].

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Paratype with labels: (1) “Pozuzo, [illegible word cross out] // pasco[Department of Pasco ], // PERU ” [white label, 2nd line handwritten in black ink]. (2) “P-TYPE // Eumolpus // viriditarsis // scintillans nv. // 1957 det. Springlova ” [white label, handwritten in black ink, with the 5th line printed except the decade of year handwritten].
Remarks :
specimen in insect pin.

subSubSection.paragraph: Paratype with labels: (1) “Rio Perené // PERU.” [white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “NHN // 840” [white label, handwritten in black ink] [red label without data]. (4) “P-TYPE // Eumolpus viriditarsis // scintillans nv. // 1956 det. Špringlová” [white label, handwritten in black ink, with the 4th line printed except the decade of year handwritten].

Paratype with labels: (1) “Pucallpa // XI.[November] 1946 // leg:[collector]Sahunke” [white label, handwritten in black ink]. (2) “P-TYPE // Eumolpus // viriditarsis nv. // 1957 det. Špringlová” [white label, handwritten in black ink, with the 4th line printed except the decade of year handwritten].
